EditPartnerLicenseForm.foodCertificateDe: The food safety and hygiene certificate is one of the mandatory requirements to become a partner of PITO. If you do not have one or are in the process of registering, PITO will come directly to survey the process and quality of the catering kitchen. We commit that all partners participating in PITO ensure quality and hygiene and safety. This is to ensure the health of customers.
EditPartnerLicenseForm.foodCertificateYe: ( Please scan or take a picture of your business license and upload the file. )
EditPartnerLicenseForm.partyInsuranceDes: Customers tend to choose partners who have purchased insurance for customers using their services and food. This is not a mandatory requirement when participating in business on the PITO platform, however, it will be a marketing advantage for the partner. Therefore, PITO encourages partners to purchase insurance.
